data.tagline: Reliable Electrical, Solar & Battery Solutions Northern Rivers
data.address: Alstonville, Northern Rivers and surrounding areas
data.about_headline: Your trusted local electrical & energy specialists.
data.about_text: Energy Medic provides residential and commercial electrical solutions including power, lighting, data, garden lighting, switchboard upgrades, and fault finding. We also design and install custom on-grid and off-grid solar and battery systems to deliver long-term reliable energy solutions.
data.service1_desc: Power, lighting, data cabling, garden lighting and all general electrical needs.

data.service3_desc: Switchboard upgrades, solar/battery diagnostics and long-term system reliability checks.

data.experience_text: Operating since 2015, Energy Medic has built a reputation for reliable electrical and renewable energy solutions with long-term client relationships at the core.
data.cta_text: Get in touch today for electrical, solar or battery work — done right the first time.

testimonials.text: May I add in the scope of providing positive feedback to you and your business: You phoned back when I left a message. You discussed in detail what my work might require and did offer to discuss further with me when you came to view it. When I prompted you via text to send me the quote, you apologised in response and sent me the quote directly via email. On planning forward, you arrived to do the job when you said you would. On the day, you and your helpful offsider were very polite to me when you needed to enter the house. When you told me afterwards that you did patch up a gaping part of my sidewall roof section with silicon ‘while you were up there’ was the added bonus. All very good communication and a most excellent service. I would recommend you to anyone.
testimonials.name: JC - Lismore Heights 2019

testimonials.text:
We've just had a solar and battery combination installed on our home and we couldn't be more happy with the service from these guys.
Luke pays great attention to detail with his work and he's very passionate and knowledgeable about all things to do with solar and renewables.
testimonials.name: Tony Browne

data.gallery_text: A look at the quality installations, upgrades and renewable systems we’ve completed for local homes and businesses.
